description: Universal compassion blessing targets - all sentient beings

targets.name: All Sentient Beings
targets.description: Universal compassion for all beings in all realms of existence
targets.intention: May all sentient beings have happiness and its causes. May all sentient beings be free from suffering and its causes. May all sentient beings never be separated from joy. May all sentient beings rest in equanimity, free from attachment and aversion.

targets.name: Beings in the Six Realms
targets.description: All beings in the six realms of samsara - gods, jealous gods, humans, animals, hungry ghosts, hell beings
targets.intention: May all beings in all six realms be liberated from suffering and attain enlightenment

targets.name: Those Currently Dying
targets.description: All beings in the process of dying at this moment worldwide
targets.intention: May all beings passing through the bardo find peaceful liberation and favorable rebirth

targets.name: Recently Deceased
targets.description: Those who have died in the past 49 days (intermediate state period)
targets.intention: May all recently deceased beings navigate the bardo successfully and attain liberation or favorable rebirth
